EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - EngineRE Migration - 2014.10.09.Email - Follow Up - Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Webinar: EngineRE Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: EngineRE Migration
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for taking the time to attend our webinar about the EngineRe migration process. We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Check out www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>for recording of this and other webinars.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
